Name: Add-SignerRule
Synopsis: Creates a signer rule and adds it to a policy.

Name: ConvertFrom-CIPolicy
Synopsis: Converts an .xml file that contains a Code Integrity policy into binary format.

Name: Get-CIPolicy
Synopsis: Gets the rules in a Code Integrity policy.

Name: Get-SystemDriver
Synopsis: Scans for drivers on the system.

Name: Merge-CIPolicy
Synopsis: Combines the rules in several Code Integrity policy files.

Name: New-CIPolicy
Synopsis: Creates a Code Integrity policy as an .xml file.

Name: New-CIPolicyRule
Synopsis: Generates Code Integrity policy rules for drivers.

Name: Set-CIPolicyIdInfo
Synopsis: Modifies the name and ID of a Code Integrity policy.

Name: Set-CIPolicyVersion
Synopsis: Updates the version number of the policy.

Name: Set-HVCIOptions
Synopsis: Modifies hypervisor Code Integrity options for a policy.

Name: Set-RuleOption
Synopsis: Modifies rule options in a Code Integrity policy.
